posts.post_title: FS: Violat PSA 4.5 Old Mill SL SOLD!
posts.post_content:
I'm offering for sale this Really Nice Juan Violat PSA 4.5 with an Old Mill Southern League back. I'm asking SOLD delivered for this very nice example. I'm always open to respectable offers. Will take Paypal or money orders. Email questions to [url]rknight1@columbus.rr.com[/url]. Thanks for looking.
